text: Ferréol Cannard (born May 28, 1978 in Morez) is a retired French biathlete. He celebrated his biggest triumphs with the French relay team at the 2006 Olympics in Turin, where he won a bronze medal with the French relay team. He also got a bronze medal with the French team at the World Championships 2004 in Oberhof. == References == * * Category:1978 births Category:French male biathletes Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic biathletes of France Category:Biathletes at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Biathletes at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Living people Category:Olympic medalists in biathlon Category:Biathlon World Championships medalists Category:Medalists at the 2006 Winter Olympics
title: Ferréol Cannard
